name: AncientWisdom
0:
”Alexa, open ancient wisdom”
”Alexa, start ancient wisdom”
”Alexa, launch ancient wisdom”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ancient wisdom
des:
"Ancient Wisdom" provides quotes from a library of ancient Greek and Roman sources. You may request another quote by saying "Next!" You can ask to hear the last quote again by saying "Repeat." Quotes have been modified where necessary to provide appropriate context or to identify individuals referenced. 

To launch this skill just say:

"Alexa, open Ancient Wisdom"
"Alexa, start Ancient Wisdom"
"Alexa, launch Ancient Wisdom"

This skill features a clip from the song Glimpse of Eternity by Meydän licensed with a Creative Commons Attribution license. 

I hope you will find the ancient's observations and suggestions helpful in your daily life. Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill. Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills. Thanks!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
